description: caused by the bacterium Xanthomonas campestris that leads to dark, sunken lesions on pepper fruits and leaves.
refers to bell pepper plants that are robust, free from diseases and pests, and exhibit vibrant green foliage and high-quality fruit.
fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani that results in dark, concentric lesions on potato leaves and stems, potentially leading to reduced yield and quality.
serious fungal disease caused by Phytophthora infestans that causes rapid decay of potato leaves, stems, and tubers, leading to significant crop loss.
refers to potato plants that are vigorous, free from diseases and pests, and produce robust tubers with no signs of rot or discoloration.
disease caused by Xanthomonas campestris that results in dark, water-soaked spots on tomato leaves, stems, and fruit, potentially reducing yield and quality.
fungal disease caused by Alternaria solani that leads to dark, concentric lesions on tomato leaves and stems, which can cause premature leaf drop and reduced fruit quality.
destructive fungal disease caused by Phytophthora infestans that causes rapid decay of leaves, stems, and fruit.
fungal disease caused by Cladosporium fulvum that results in yellowing and moldy spots on the upper surfaces of tomato leaves.
fungal disease caused by Septoria lycopersici that leads to small, dark spots with light centers on tomato leaves, causing premature leaf drop and reduced plant vigor.

disease: Tomato spide mites two sotted spider mite
description: infests tomato plants, causing stippling, leaf discoloration, and webbing.
fungal disease caused by Corynespora cassiicola that creates concentric, target-like lesions on tomato leaves and stems, leading to reduced plant health.
viral disease that causes yellowing, curling, and stunting of tomato leaves, leading to reduced fruit yield and quality.
viral disease that causes mottled, distorted leaves and reduced fruit yield in tomatoes.
refers to tomato plants that are vigorous, free from diseases and pests, with lush green foliage and strong fruit production.
